rev.desc.rev.desc: Added a new process panel after the mb.ok panel to set the reset flag instead of on the start panel. This should keep the file variable from changing unless the password reset is performed.
Modified app to mark the expire.password field to true which will force a password change on next login.
Modified so that if max password lifetime or max logins feature is used, than if a password is "reset", the max period/logins are set forcing a password change on login.
Added the password reset confirmation popup.

descript.descript: Added a new process panel after the mb.ok panel to set the reset flag instead of on the start panel. This should keep the file variable from changing unless the password reset is performed.
Modified app to mark the expire.password field to true which will force a password change on next login.
Modified so that if max password lifetime or max logins feature is used, than if a password is "reset", the max period/logins are set forcing a password change on login.
Added the password reset confirmation popup.
